riddles.question: I have no muscle, yet I rule two hemispheres. What am I?
What goes up and down but doesn't move?
What can travel around the world while staying in a corner?
What is it that nobody wants to have, but nobody wants to lose?
If you possess me, you'll want to share me. But if you share me, I'll be gone. What am I?
What belongs to you but is used by others?
Hit me hard and I'll crack, but you'll never stop me staring back. What am I?
I'm where yesterday follows today, and tomorrow is in the middle. What am I?
What is the beginning of Eternity, the end of time and space, the beginning of every end, and the end of every race?
The more there is, the less you see. What could I be?
